entries.meaning: (countable) A pigeon, especially one smaller in size; a bird (often arbitrarily called either a pigeon or a dove or both) of more than 300 species of the family Columbidae.
(countable, politics) A person favouring conciliation and negotiation rather than conflict.
(countable) Term of endearment for one regarded as pure and gentle.
examples: O my dove,  [â€¦]  let me hear thy voice.

entries.meaning: A greyish, bluish, pinkish colour like that of the bird.
(slang, countable) Short for love dove (â€œtablet of the drug ecstasyâ€).
